=== Summary ===

An Edubuntu Community Meeting is scheduled to happen in the Ubuntu Developers Conference in Paris. No date has been scheduled yet, that will happen on the wednesday morning, on Europe/Paris timezone.

=== Discussion Topics ===

* Further development of the Community
* Brainstorm for next Edubuntu Summit
* Ways of increase commnity involvement in the project
* Anything you want to discuss - just add it here :)

=== Attendees ===

* OliverGrawert
* RodrigoNovo
* You :)

=== Remote Attendance ===

It is possible to attend this meeting remotely, using <nowiki>[[http://www.goteamspeak.com/index.php?page=downloads|TeamSpeak]]</nowiki> (sorry, unfortunately, non-free software :/ )
